mapper.sql: orderno, totalprice, totalnum, freightprice, actualpayprice,userlogisticsnoComp, userlogisticsno,logisticsnoComp, logisticsno, user_id, store_id, type,qrcode_url,shoporderstatusCode, receipt_address_id, comment, deleteCode,create_time, update_time, descriplevel,pay_result
mapper.select: select orderno, totalprice, totalnum, freightprice, actualpayprice, userlogisticsno, logisticsno, (select e.company from express_company as e where e.number=logisticsnoComp) as logisticsCompany,user_id, store_id, type,qrcode_url,shoporderstatusCode, receipt_address_id, comment, deleteCode,create_time, update_time, descriplevel, (select dictname from vw_dictdetail where eng='orderstatus' and codevalue=shoporderstatusCode) as showuserstatus, (select shortname from vw_dictdetail where eng='orderstatus' and codevalue=shoporderstatusCode) as showplatstatus from shoporder where orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into shoporder (orderno, totalprice, totalnum, freightprice, actualpayprice, userlogisticsnoComp, userlogisticsno, logisticsnoComp, logisticsno, user_id, store_id, type, qrcode_url, descriplevel, shoporderstatusCode, receipt_address_id, comment, deleteCode, create_time, update_time, pay_result ) values (#{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freightprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{actualpayprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userlogisticsnocomp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userlogisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsnocomp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriplevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shoporderstatuscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletecode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update shoporder
totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
totalnum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
freightprice = #{freightprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
actualpayprice = #{actualpayprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
userlogisticsnoComp = #{userlogisticsnocomp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userlogisticsno = #{userlogisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logisticsnoComp = #{logisticsnocomp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logisticsno = #{logisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descriplevel = #{descriplevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shoporderstatusCode = #{shoporderstatuscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receipt_address_id = #{receiptAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleteCode = #{deletecode,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_result = #{payResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update shoporder set totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, totalnum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, freightprice = #{freightprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, actualpayprice = #{actualpayprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, userlogisticsnoComp = #{userlogisticsnocomp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userlogisticsno = #{userlogisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logisticsnoComp = #{logisticsnocomp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logisticsno = #{logisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descriplevel = #{descriplevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shoporderstatusCode = #{shoporderstatuscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_address_id = #{receiptAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleteCode = #{deletecode,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_result = #{payResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o.orderno , o.create_time ,o.store_id, o.receipt_address_id ,o.userlogisticsno ,o.userlogisticsnoComp, (select company from express_company where number=o.userlogisticsnoComp) usrLogisticsCompName, o.logisticsno ,O.logisticsnoComp ,(select company from express_company where number=o.logisticsnoComp) logisticsCompName, a.user_name , a.tel_number ,a.province_name ,a.city_name ,a.country_name,a.detail_info,s.`name`,s.phone,s.address from shoporder o LEFT JOIN receipt_address a on a.id = o.receipt_address_id LEFT JOIN store s on s.id=o.store_id where o.orderno = #{orderno}
